DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.gl_journal_header g left join xbs.gl_ledger g0 on g.ledger_id=g0.gl_ledger_id left join xbs.gl_period g1 on g.period_id=g1.gl_period_id left join xbs.currency c on g.currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.currency c0 on g.doc_currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.option_line o on g.journal_source=o.option_line_code and o.option_header_id=263 left join xbs.option_line o0 on g.journal_category=o0.option_line_code and o0.option_header_id=157 left join xbs.option_line o1 on g.balance_type=o1.option_line_id and o1.option_header_id=155 left join xbs.gl_currency_conversion g2 on g.exchange_type=g2.gl_currency_conversion_id left join xbs.option_line o2 on g.status=o2.option_line_id
DbDetails.Data: g.journal_name,g0.ledger ledger_id,g1.period_name period_id,c.title currency,c0.title doc_currency,g.exchange_rate,g.document_date,o.option_line_value journal_source,o0.option_line_value journal_category,o1.option_line_value balance_type,g.description,g2.currency_conversion_type exchange_type,g.reference_type,g.reference_key_name,g.reference_key_value,g.created_by,g.creation_date,g.last_update_by,g.last_update_date,g.gl_journal_header_id,g.post_date,o2.option_line_value status
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{table} where %{where} and g.created_by='%{user_id}' limit %{StartRow},%{PgSize}
